ygData.subject: Re: L46 weapon effectiveness.
ygData.msgSnippet: Because as a Bard I rarely solo.  I sing the following: (level 34 bard on Veeshan, my songs on my 50 bard on test are drastically different) As Melee Bard:
ygData.messageBody:
Because as a Bard I rarely solo. I sing the following: (level 34 bard on Veeshan, my songs on my 50 bard on test are
drastically different)

As Melee Bard:
HoR, Anthem, Psalm of XXX

As anti-caster:
Elemental Rhythms, Purifying Rhythms, Anthem *with Drums equipped* (if he's
too high for me to affect with the below)
or
Volley-fire Pixie Strike at him while wielding two gnoll hide lariats
(almost 100% caster shutdown usually)

As Crowd control:
Pixie Strike, Charm, HoR

Solo Bard:
HoR, Warsong, Psalm of XXX

Those are my most frequent combinations but there are numerous others.

Remember folks: You're a bard, you have TONS of abilities, learn to use all of them, don't be a Bellow Bard (or variant thereof)

Lyrnia Jongleur - 34th Bard, Veeshan... 50th Bard, Test
PS: I Can sing a 4 song medly but it's entirely too much work

----- Original Message -----
From: Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 10:40 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] L46 weapon effectiveness.


> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> Heh, I made that same mistake (not using it.)
>
> Warsong is self-only and probably the best song for the bard - definitely
> the best if you are soloing and attacking with melee weapons. If you can
> play 3 songs and you are in the melee and have good weapons, i'd say you
> definitely should think about using it. Even if you can only play 2
songs -
> consider it. Especially if you dont have celerity yet or are not haste
> buffed. A Flowing Black Silk Sash adds 20% atk speed. You have "one" in
> your song book - why not "wear" it?
>
> Sylly
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Kevin L. Crawford <Lyrnia@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 8:21 AM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] L46 weapon effectiveness.
>
>
> > From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
> >
> > Warsong is self-only so is rarely used at higher levels. Also, I'm not
> > entirely sure it stacks with anything except Anthem... not sure though,
>
> > never tested it. After about level 20 I never had it memmed
>
>
